net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser

Class BaseCsvLineParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser.BaseCsvLineParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICsvByteLineParser, ICsvCharLineParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicCsvLineParser, StandardCsvLineParser

    public abstract class BaseCsvLineParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICsvCharLineParser, ICsvByteLineParser
    Class contains common code for use in other CSV parser's A Csv Parser is used to split a Csv line in to seperate fields
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
